title: Roasted beetroot and pea shoot salad

ingredients.item: 400g fresh beetroot, trimmed and scrubbed, halved if large
125g essential Waitrose Greek Light Salad Cheese, crumbled
4 x 60g bags Steve’s Leaves Pea Shoots & Baby Leaves
2 tbsp roughly chopped fresh mint leaves

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 190ºC, gas mark 5. Put the beetroot and 1 tbsp of the oil in a roasting tin, season and roast for 15 minutes. Add the potatoes and stir to coat in the oil. Roast for a further 30 minutes, or until tender when pierced with the tip of a knife. Remove from the oven and leave to cool slightly.
Peel the beetroot and cut into bitesize wedges. Transfer to a bowl with the potatoes, salad cheese and salad leaves.
Mix the remaining oil, horseradish, lemon juice and mint together to make a dressing. Drizzle over the salad and mix gently to coat. Scatter over the pumpkin seeds to serve.
